Hanzi: 褋

幉字的基本解释

幉
义未详。

幉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dié］
［《廣韻》徒協切，入帖，定。］
(1)古代可供书写的简札。
(2)表册；谱籍。
(3)泛指书籍。
(4)授予官职的文书。
(5)证件；凭证。
(6)官府公文的一种。
(7)呈文。
(8)指讼辞。参见“牒訴”。
(9)发文；行文。
(10)木板。
(11)叠布。
(12)重叠；折叠。
(13)量词。犹篇。
(14)量词。犹扇。
(15)量词。犹件。
(16)姓。北齐有牃舍乐。见《北齐书·慕容俨传》。

幉字的康熙字典解释
幉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
幉字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
The meaning is unclear.
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dié］
["Guangyun" Apprentice Xie cut, enter the post, set. ]
(1) A short note that can be written in ancient times.
(2) Table book; genealogy book.
(3) Refers to books in general.
(4) Documents conferring official positions.
(5) Credentials; certificates.
(6) A type of official documents.
(7) Submission.
(8) Refers to litigation. See "Sue".
(9) Posting; writing.
(10) Planks.
(11) Folding cloth.
(12) Overlapping; folding.
(13) Quantifiers. Still articles.
(14) Quantifiers. Still fan.
(15) Quantifiers. Still pieces.
(16) Last name. There is Luoshele in the Northern Qi Dynasty. See "Book of Northern Qi·Murong Yan Biography".
